name: swing-music
description: SwingMusic is a self-hosted music streaming server and player with playlists, search, and a modern responsive UI for listening to your own collection.
features: Music streaming: Streams personal music collection through web interface.
Library scanning: Automatically scans and indexes music files with metadata.
Playlist management: Creates and manages playlists with drag-and-drop organization.
Search functionality: Finds songs, albums, and artists quickly with instant search.
Album artwork: Displays cover art from embedded tags or online sources.
Audio formats: Supports MP3, FLAC, AAC, OGG, and other common formats.
Transcoding: Converts audio on-the-fly for bandwidth-limited connections.
Queue management: Builds and reorders playback queue dynamically.
Favorites: Marks favorite songs, albums, and artists for quick access.
Recently played: Tracks listening history and recently played tracks.
Mobile responsive: Streams music from smartphones and tablets.
Keyboard shortcuts: Controls playback with keyboard for efficient navigation.
